solfran.p-solfran: Quality Inspector in SOLFRAN Laboratorios 2012-2017 doing the following activities:
solfran.ul-solfran1: Carry out inspections of finished product and bulk product
solfran.ul-solfran3: Sample of raw material under the regime of ANSI tables.
solfran.ul-solfran5: Release or retention of finished product.
solfran.ul-solfran6: Sample of injectable, purified water and clean steam.
solfran.ul-solfran7: Use of equipment such as potentiometer, viscometer, embrittlement, durometer.
solfran.ul-solfran9: I have experience in solids, liquids, beta-lactams, injectables and MP

obra.p-obra: Construction resident in Consorcio Linea 3 2017-2018 performing the following activities:
obra.ul-obra3: Inventory and management of machinery and refractions.
obra.ul-obra4: Management and approval of paid hours of the staff under my command.
obra.ul-obra5: Organization and supervision of one of the fronts in the disassembly of a tunnel boring machine, being in charge of 35 people plus contractors.
obra.ul-obra6: Management of machinery such as compressors, generator sets, cranes from 80 to 800 tons, dumps, low beds, etc.
obra.ul-obra7: Supervisión en obra instalación de tuberia hincada con microtuneladora 2m diametro, teniendo a mi cargo 25 personas más maquinaría.

flex.p-flex: Regional Industrial Engineer jr 2019-2020 during my stay at Flex I performed the following functions:
flex.ul-flex2: Design LayOut for new production lines.
flex.ul-flex8: Process optimization projects, using lean sixsigma
flex.ul-flex9: Engineering support to different electronic and mechanical metal ships.

pisa.p-pisa: Sr Industrial Engineer at PiSA Laboratories 2020-2023 performing the following activities:
pisa.ul-pisa3: Study of capacity and saturation in production lines.
pisa.ul-pisa5: Statistical studies such as ANOVA, Monte Carlo, graphs and hypotheses.
pisa.ul-pisa6: Design LayOut for new production lines.
pisa.ul-pisa9: Participation in manufacturing cost saving projects.
pisa.ul-pisa11: Teach basic courses in lean manufacturing and 5S.
pisa.ul-pisa12: Participation in projects to increase productive efficiency, Oee.
pisa.ul-pisa13: Use of lean manufacturing tools and six sigma

acercaMi.p-acercaMi: I am an Industrial Engineer graduated from UTEG I am 30 years old, I consider myself a self-taught person and I focus on continuous learning. I always try to prove my skills and knowledge, I seek personal growth and the growth of the company which becomes oneself at a certain point, I like to offer good performance and be constantly evaluated to achieve progress with constructive criticism. I like to take initiatives to go for new technologies and create my own things just like this website.
